array.string: timeout 30 bash -c 'until lsof -i :${CD_PROXY_PORT:-8080} >/dev/null 2>&1; do sleep 0.2; done' # Discord’u başlat exec /Applications/Discord.app/Contents/MacOS/Discord --proxy-server=http://127.0.0.1:${CD_PROXY_PORT:-8080} & # 5 sn sonra proxy bağlantısını kontrol et, yoksa bildirim at (sleep 5 && netstat -an | grep -q ":${CD_PROXY_PORT:-8080}.*ESTABLISHED" || osascript -e 'display notification "Discord proxy’ye bağlanamadı" with title "SplitWire"') &
